description: This file defines a mock class `PowerManagerHalMock` for testing purposes, which inherits from `PowerManagerImpl`. It uses Google Mock (`gmock`) to create mock methods for various power management and deep sleep related functions, facilitating unit testing in the project. The class provides mock implementations for platform-specific power and deep sleep management interfaces.

classes.name: PowerManagerHalMock
classes.description: A mock class inheriting from PowerManagerImpl, used for unit testing power management functionalities.

methods.name: PLAT_API_SetPowerState
methods.description: Mock method to set power state.

methods.name: PLAT_API_GetPowerState
methods.description: Mock method to get current power state.

methods.name: PLAT_API_SetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Mock method to set wakeup source.

methods.name: PLAT_API_GetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Mock method to get wakeup source.

methods.name: PLAT_Reset
methods.description: Mock method to reset power manager.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_INIT
methods.description: Mock method to initialize deep sleep.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_SetDeepSleep
methods.description: Mock method to set deep sleep parameters.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_DeepSleepWakeup
methods.description: Mock method for deep sleep wakeup.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupReason
methods.description: Mock method to get last wakeup reason.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupKeyCode
methods.description: Mock method to get last wakeup key code.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_TERM
methods.description: Mock method to terminate deep sleep management.
